thread.title: Ground News - A sea of lights attracts attention on Kieselbronn's roads
thread.title_full: Ground News - A sea of lights attracts attention on Kieselbronn's roads

author: Badische Neueste Nachrichten
title: Ground News - A sea of lights attracts attention on Kieselbronn's roads
text:
Summary by Badische Neueste Nachrichten In the small community, a large parade of brightly decorated tractors, ride-on lawnmowers and scooters has attracted countless spectators. The mayor was also there: as Santa Claus on a Unimog. Share menu More
